title: Want To See "Get Out" In Theatres? Chance The Rapper Is Hooking You Up TODAY ONLY!
text:
If you're in Chicago and want to catch the new movie "Get Out", Chance The Rapper just hooked you up! 
Hurry and get over the Chatham Theatre on 87th! 
Thanks Chance! I bought all the tickets to #GetOut at Chatham Theatre on 87th Just pull up with ID and enjoy the movie. — Lil Chano From 79th (@chancetherapper) February 26, 2017 DID I NOT TELL YALL #GETOUT WAS INCREDIBLE!! BEST FILM ACROSS ANY GENRE IN AWHILE GO SEE IT TODAY! Cc: @LilRel4 @JordanPeele — Lil Chano From 79th (@chancetherapper) February 26, 2017 #TrendingTracks
